### Affiliations
I'm conducting my work as part of the [Institute for Logic, Lanugauge and Computation](https://www.illc.uva.nl/) at the [University of Amsterdam](https://www.uva.nl/) in the Netherlands. 

### Collaborations  
For ongoing collaborations (e.g., my supervisors) please see the [bias-barometer project website](https://bias-barometer.github.io)

### Funding
The research we conduct is funded by the Dutch Research Council ([NWO](https://www.nwo.nl/en/about-nwo/what+does+nwo+do)) as part of the project [The Biased Reality of Online Media](https://www.nwo.nl/en/research-and-results/research-projects/i/52/35152.html)
